data.name: addressOrXpub
data.description: An address or  [  _xPub_ ](types/#xpub)  to fetch UTXOs for

data.name: xpub
data.description: If addressOrXpub is an  [  _xPub_ ](types/#xpub)  set to true

data.name: Signer
data.description: [  _Signer_ ](types/#Signer)  object if you wish to update change/receiving indexes from backend provider (and XPUB token information is provided in response)
